content:
Within the framework of the official visit to Ukraine in Odessa, a meeting of the National Assembly of the French Republic of Yael Bron-Powd was attended by the Verkhovna Rada Chairman Ruslan Stefanchuk, Commander of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Vice-Admiral Alexei Nahzhpapa and representatives of local authorities.

This is stated inmessageNavy of the Armed Forces.

Yael Bron-Powder, as noted, testified to the strong support of the people of France of the Ukrainian people in his struggle against Russian aggression.

"The French side paid considerable attention to the successes of Ukraine in the sea," - the message reads.

During the meeting, the current security situation in the Black Sea region, including the issue of mine danger in the Black Sea caused by the Russian aggression, was discussed.

Yael Bron-Powder was introduced to some aspects of the National Fleet during Ukraine's defense.

The attendees discussed the issues of the needs of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in military assistance to increase combat capabilities.

The Commander of the Navy of Ukraine thanked the French side for the continued support of Ukraine and expressed his hope for further fruitful cooperation.

As reported by the Armyinform, March 30, 2024 Yael Bron-PowVisitedThe seaport in Odessa, which has repeatedly attacked Russian missiles and drones.
title: At a meeting with the Commander of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the Chairman of the National Assembly of France noted the successes of Ukraine
description: This is stated in the message of the Navy of the Armed Forces. Yael Bron-Powe, as noted, testified ...
author: Army Inform
